price: 39. Lui et ses armées se montrèrent injustement hautains et dédaigneux sur terre, croyant qu’ils ne seraient point ramenés vers Nous.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'takbara huwa wajunūduhu fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi waẓannū annahum ilaynā lā yur'jaʿūna
